name: kickstarter-static
description: Kickstarter for a simple static site build
author: Lee Marsden

scripts.css: mkdir dist/css && node-sass src/css/main.scss | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' | postcss -u postcss-vr | postcss -u postcss-pxtorem | postcss -u postcss-focus | postcss -u css-mqpacker > dist/css/main.css
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run clean && npm run html && npm run css
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run postcss:csso
